data.title: GAS KILLS MOTHER OF WALT DISNEY; Father of Cartoonist and Maid Are in Hollywood Hospital
data.meta_description: Mrs F Disney; 2 overcome, furnace fumes, Los Angeles

GAS KILLS MOTHER OF WALT DISNEY; Father of Cartoonist and Maid Are in Hollywood Hospital

Nov. 27, 1938

See the article in its original context from

November 27, 1938 , Section General , Page 38Buy Reprints

TimesMachine is an exclusive benefit for home delivery and digital subscribers.

Full text is unavailable for this digitized archive article. Subscribers may view the full text of this article in its original form through TimesMachine.

Mrs. Flora Disney, 70, mother of Walt Disney, was found dead in her home, today, from gas poisoning. The cartoonist's father. Elias Disney, 79, also a victim of carbon monoxide, was revived after Alma Smith, a housemaid, had notified the police. She and Mr. Disney are at the Hollywood Hospital.
